repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Note with Title identified and content noted before the front folio- Yajurvedabhaṭṭabhāskabhāṣya by bhaṭṭabhāskara 7th khānḍa 4th praśnas Granth M 28 96 p. 11 l. It could be the part of the big manuscript as manuscript begins with number 147 and at some point some one has separated it section wise.

msItem.title: Yajurvedabhāṣya 7th Kāṇḍa
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit: 147v 1 yetvarthanāmaviṣitya vi(illegible 1 syllable.)tsyate sa tasmin lokasthānepuṣmamindrovṛtraṃ hatavāna tasmāt kālaviśeṣalābhādhyai bhavati kiñca sākṣādavyavadhānena 147v 2 vajraṃ bhrātravyāya (illegible 1 syllable.)harati ariṇaviśaṃgaḥ varṇovarṇeṣvatte otyavyayena pravartate śatau ca vajrabhyāṃ (illegible 1 syllable.)paṭha 147v 3 ṣaṣṭhena kāṇḍena dīkṣādyudayanīyāntogniṣṭomassagaṇaḥ pratipāditaḥ sa idānīmiha vidhīyate pūrvasmin hi karttavyatāmātramasya vihītaṃ asyaiva guṇavikā 147v 4 rāḥ sarvasṃśthā [uttā] (uttarā) aghniṣṭomādyaptoryyāmāntā etatprakṛtikāssarve viśvajidādaya ekāhā dvirātraprakṛtaprabhṛtayaścāhīnāḥ
msItem.explicit: 185v 6 caturthe viṃśaḥ .. atha naktahomeṣveva sanatihomāssthitāya svāhetyādayo nigadasiddhā
msItem.finalRubric: 185v 6 iti bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśraviraci 185v 7 te yajurvedabhāṣye jāñnayajñānākhye saptame kāṇḍe caturthe prapāṭhake dvāviṃśonuvākaḥ samāptaprapāṭhakañca .. 185v 8 … hariḥ oṃ …. …. … .. ..

support.p: Thin plam leaf as a guard cover.

extent.measure: 2 guard , 2 blank folio and 38 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: sloppy , sometimes words are not written completely. spelling mistakes. Clusters are very confusing. Sharp pointed characters.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 11-12, kāṇḍa 6.3–7.5 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 18 Mysore Government Branch press 1897-1898 .(Volumes are available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
